data.title: Peel Public Health running dozens of vaccine clinics at Brampton, Mississauga schools
data.meta_description: Peel Public Health is hosting several COVID-19 vaccination clinics in Mississauga and Brampton schools
data.text:
By Jeffrey Allen

Published September 28, 2021 at 11:17 am

Peel Public Health is hosting several COVID-19 vaccination clinics in Mississauga and Brampton schools.

Anyone born in 2009 or earlier can attend a school vaccine clinic to get their first or second dose of the COVID-19 vaccine. No appointments are necessary.

Here is a list of all upcoming clinics:

Sandalwood Heights Secondary School — 2671 Sandalwood Pkwy. E., Brampton; October 4 from 5 to 7:30 p.m.

Cardinal Leger Secondary School — 75 Mary St., Brampton; September 28 from 5 to 7:30 p.m.

David Suzuki Secondary School — 45 Daviselm Dr., Brampton; September 29 from 5 to 7:30 p.m.

Cardinal Ambrozic Catholic Secondary School — 10 Castle Oaks Crossing, Brampton; September 30 from 5 to 7:30 p.m.

Chinguacousy Secondary School — 1370 Williams Pkwy E., Brampton; October 1 from 5 to 7:30 p.m.

Fletcher’s Meadow Secondary School — 10750 Chinguacousy Rd., Brampton; October 10 and 24 from 11:30 a.m. to 6:30 p.m.

École secondaire Jeunes sans frontières — 7585 Promenade Financial, Brampton; October 5, 12, 19 and 26 from 11:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. *Note: 11:30 to 3 p.m. is dedicated for staff and student population of Jeunes sans frontières.

St. Michael Catholic Secondary School — 9130 Columbia Way, Caledon; October 4, 11, 18 and 25 from 5 to 7:30 p.m.

St. Alfred Separate School — 3341 Havenwood Dr., Mississauga; October 4 from 5 to 7:30 p.m.

Lincoln M. Alexander Secondary School — 3545 Morning Star Dr., Mississauga; September 28 from 5 to 7:30 p.m.

École secondaire catholique Sainte-Famille — 1780 Meadowvale Blvd., Mississauga; September 30 from 5 to 7:30 p.m.

Ascension of Our Lord Secondary School — 7640 Anaka Dr., Mississauga; October 2 and 16 from 11 a.m. to 6:30 p.m.

Applewood Heights Secondary School — 945 Bloor St. E., Mississauga; October 3 and 17 from 11 a.m. to 6:30 p.m.

Father Michael Goetz Secondary School — 330 Central Pkwy. W., Mississauga; October 9 and 23 from 11 a.m. to 6:30 p.m.

Father Daniel Zanon — 450 Hillcrest Ave., Mississauga, October 1, 8, 15, 22 and 29 from 5 to 7:30 p.m.

Our Lady of Mt. Carmel Secondary School — 3700 Trelawny Cir., Mississauga; October 7, 14, 21 and 28 from 5 to 7:30 p.m.
